name: Grave Domain
description: Clerics of the Grave Domain watch over the boundary between life and death, ensuring the dead rest and the living endure, while punishing those who pervert fate.

1.name: Grave Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Circle of Mortality
1.description: You are especially effective at restoring creatures near death, and you learn spare the dying cantrip (or gain an improved version).

1.name: Eyes of the Grave
1.description: You can sense the presence of undead within range a limited number of times.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
2.description: You curse a creature, making it vulnerable to the next instance of damage it takes.

6.name: Sentinel at Deathâ€™s Door
6.description: You can turn a critical hit against you or an ally into a normal hit.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: You add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

17.name: Keeper of Souls
17.description: When a creature dies near you, you can restore hit points to a creature you can see.
